name: Sand & Wind
description:
Your town is constantly ravaged by sand storms. There seems to be another one approaching shortly. 

Repair the buildings around your town to increase the survivability and  structural integrity of the building. Gather resources to repair the buildings by repairing the non functioning droids scattered around.

Once the droids are repaired they will begin harvesting their specified resource for you.

Controls:

  • W, A, S, D - Movement
  • E - Interact
  • Esc - Pause

Created By: @n0thing777x
